original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṁ anekapariyāyena dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam lakuṇḍakabhaddiyam aneka pariyāyena dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti

original: Atha kho āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyassa āyasmatā sāriputtena anekapariyāyena dhammiyā
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyassa āyasmatā sāriputtena aneka pariyāyena dhammiyā

original: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṁ āyasmatā sāriputtena anekapariyāyena
analyzed: addasā khalu bhagavā āyasmantam lakuṇḍakabhaddiyam āyasmatā sāriputtena aneka pariyāyena

original: dhammiyā kathāya sandassiyamānaṁ samādapiyamānaṁ samuttejiyamānaṁ sampahaṁsiyamānaṁ
analyzed: dhammiyā kathāya sandassiyamānam samādapiyamānam samuttejiyamānam sampahasiyamāna

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
ayam aham asmi iti an ānupassī
